snippet.title: Altered Images: Godzilla, Lenin's tomb and Red Square suitcase
snippet.description:
News from Elsewhere / 29 November 2013
… ticket sales going to a children's charity. But it blocked the view of landmarks such as St Basil's Cathedral, Lenin Mausoleum and the Kremlin.

snippet.title: Red Square naked nail protester faces criminal charges
snippet.description:
Europe / 15 November 2013
… with a fine and going up to a five-year prison sentence. His graphic act outside the Lenin Mausoleum was recorded on video which was put online.

snippet.title: Naked artist nails himself to Red Square in protest
snippet.description:
Europe / 11 November 2013
… of the police state closer through its inaction." His graphic act outside the Lenin Mausoleum was recorded on video which was put online before…
